name: PN Kurei Kei Number Puzzle 声優ボイス萌えアニメとパズル
name_original: PN Kurei Kei Number Puzzle 声優ボイス萌えアニメとパズル
description:
***PN Kurei Kei is funny number puzzle game***
A block of numbers that are arranged below in drag with your finger, let's put on a favorite location of the mass of the board.
In order not to the board to fill up, it is important to thinking.

***Basics of how to play***
• To remove the block, to collect more than it is written numbers.
• Blocks that are arranged in the bottom, and can be rotated in the tap before putting.
• If the score increases, you will be pressed the [C] button in the upper right corner at regular intervals. Since erasable by selecting your favorite numbers on the board, you can escape from the pinch.

***Creator***
Game Developer : TOKUDA TAKASHI (Taka Software)
Designer : TOKUDA AOI (Taka Software)

This game is a Kurei Kei edition of popular game "PutNumber" that we have created.
